_description: Simulated NWS Daily Climate Report (CLI) data for NYC Central Park. The real CLI is a text report; this JSON represents the parsed/normalized version our code produces.

_settlement_notes.measurement_period: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM LOCAL STANDARD TIME (EST, NOT EDT)
_settlement_notes.max_temp_determines_bracket: The max_f value (56) is what Kalshi uses for settlement
_settlement_notes.winning_market: KXHIGHNY-25FEB15-B3 YES holders win $1.00, all other brackets pay $0
